mapper.sql: id, title, content, yhzh, address, meetingTime, createId, createTime, delflag
mapper.insert: insert into countryside_meeting (title, content, address, meetingTime, yhzh, createId, createTime, delflag) values (#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{delflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update countryside_meeting set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meetingTime = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, yhzh = #{yhzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
update countryside_meeting set delflag = 'D' where id = #{id}
